description: Princess-Coordination reports planning/orchestration status to Queen (completion or escalation)

expected_escalation_message.summary: OAuth2 implementation coordinated successfully. 18 tasks executed across 4 agents, $11.80 total cost (5.6% under budget).

optimizations: Task parallelization saved 2 hours

blocker_details.issue: Resource contention: 3 parallel tasks need same infrastructure component

expected_escalation_message.summary: Microservices migration coordination blocked by resource contention. 3 parallel tasks competing for database migration lock.

blocker.description: Planned parallel execution of 3 microservice migrations, but all require exclusive database migration lock.
blocker.impact: High - delays timeline by 6 hours (sequential execution), increases cost by $45

contention_details.current_state: deadlock risk if executed in parallel

options.description: Refactor to allow parallel migrations with partitioned schema changes

recommendations.rationale: Sequential execution safer for production migration, cost acceptable

expected_escalation_message.summary: React dashboard coordination successful. 12 tasks executed with 3 parallel phases, saved 4 hours through parallelization.

optimizations: Parallel component development highly effective

decision_point.issue: Task decomposition reveals 3 approaches to resolver implementation: monolithic, layered, domain-driven
decision_point.impact: Strategic - affects maintainability, testing, and team structure

expected_escalation_message.summary: GraphQL API coordination requires architectural decision on resolver organization strategy.

decision_point.description: Planning revealed 3 viable approaches to organizing GraphQL resolvers. Need strategic direction before orchestration.
decision_point.impact: Strategic - affects code organization, testing strategy, and team workflow

options.description: Monolithic resolver files (1 file per type)

recommendations.rationale: Layered approach provides good testability and supports projected growth without over-engineering

expected_escalation_message.summary: Payment integration coordinated successfully. 24 tasks executed with comprehensive testing, $19.50 total cost (8.3% over budget due to additional security testing).

cost_summary.variance_reason: Added 3 security testing tasks after threat modeling

optimizations: Security review added value, budget variance acceptable

blocker_details.issue: Dependencies between tasks create critical path longer than deadline

expected_escalation_message.summary: WebSocket chat coordination blocked by timeline constraint. Critical path 28 hours exceeds 24-hour deadline.

blocker.description: Task dependency analysis reveals critical path of 28 hours, but project has 24-hour deadline.
blocker.impact: High - cannot meet deadline without scope reduction or additional resources

options.description: Reduce scope: defer message persistence to v2

recommendations.rationale: Core chat functionality without persistence meets MVP, can iterate in v2

expected_escalation_message.summary: Elasticsearch search coordination successful. 16 tasks executed efficiently, $13.20 total cost (5.7% under budget).

optimizations: Relevance tuning completed faster than expected

expected_escalation_message.summary: Kubernetes migration coordinated successfully. 32 tasks executed across infrastructure and dev teams, $45.60 total cost.

optimizations: Parallel infrastructure provisioning saved 4 hours

decision_point.issue: Cost estimate ($185) exceeds budget ($120) due to GPU requirements for model optimization
decision_point.impact: Budget constraint vs performance requirement trade-off

expected_escalation_message.summary: ML model API coordination requires budget decision. Estimated cost $185 exceeds $120 budget due to GPU optimization needs.

decision_point.description: Task planning estimates $185 cost due to GPU-accelerated model optimization, but budget allocated is $120.
decision_point.impact: High - affects performance vs cost trade-off

options.description: Proceed with GPU optimization (exceed budget by $65)

recommendations.rationale: Hybrid approach balances cost ($140) with acceptable performance (800ms), can optimize further in v2

expected_escalation_message.summary: CI/CD pipeline coordination successful. 10 tasks executed, will save 12 hours/week manual effort and reduce deployment errors by 75%.

optimizations: Pipeline automation provides immediate ROI

blocker_details.issue: Team split on architectural approach: 2 developers prefer schema-per-tenant, 2 prefer shared schema

expected_escalation_message.summary: Multi-tenant architecture coordination blocked by team architectural disagreement. Need executive decision within 24 hours.

blocker.description: Planning phase revealed strong disagreement between team members on fundamental architecture. 2 developers advocate schema-per-tenant (security focus), 2 advocate shared schema (scalability focus).
blocker.impact: Critical - blocks all development, team morale at risk, deadline in 24 hours

technical_considerations.security_requirements: GDPR compliance required for EU customers

options.description: Hybrid approach (schema-per-tenant for enterprise, shared for SMB)

recommendations.rationale: Hybrid approach addresses both security and scalability concerns, likely to achieve team buy-in
recommendations.facilitation_needed: Recommend architecture review meeting with neutral facilitator

expected_escalation_message.summary: gRPC API coordination successful. 14 tasks executed with excellent performance metrics, $10.20 total cost (7.3% under budget).

optimizations: Proto-first development approach highly efficient

expected_escalation_message.summary: Event sourcing coordination successful. 28 tasks executed with saga pattern implementation, $35.80 total cost (11.9% over budget due to complexity).

cost_summary.variance_reason: Saga pattern more complex than initial estimate

optimizations: Saga pattern complexity justified for distributed transactions

decision_point.issue: Build vs buy decision for feature flag service: custom implementation vs LaunchDarkly
decision_point.impact: Strategic - affects long-term cost, features, and vendor lock-in

expected_escalation_message.summary: Feature flags coordination requires build vs buy decision. Custom implementation ($18 cost) vs LaunchDarkly ($50/month).

decision_point.description: Task planning reveals two approaches: build custom feature flag service or integrate LaunchDarkly SaaS.
decision_point.impact: Strategic - affects development time, ongoing cost, and feature availability

analysis.breakeven_analysis: LaunchDarkly breaks even at 25 months ($50/mo * 25 = $1250 vs $18 + $2/mo * 25 = $68)
analysis.risk_assessment: Custom solution sufficient for current needs, can migrate to SaaS later if needed

recommendations.rationale: Current requirements simple, custom solution adequate. Can migrate to SaaS if advanced features needed.

optimizations: Resumable upload implementation more complex but worth it for UX

decision_point.issue: High-impact architectural decision on sharding key requires senior leadership sign-off
decision_point.impact: Critical - affects long-term scalability, query patterns, and data locality

expected_escalation_message.summary: Database sharding coordination requires executive decision on sharding strategy. Critical impact on scalability and query patterns.

decision_point.description: Database sharding is critical decision affecting years of development. Planning complete, need executive approval before orchestration.
decision_point.impact: Critical - affects all future queries, difficult to change after implementation, 6-10 week migration

strategic_considerations.compliance_requirements: GDPR requires data isolation for EU tenants

recommended_option.rationale: Optimizes for 95% of queries, meets GDPR requirements, lowest cost
recommended_option.risk_mitigation: Sub-shard large tenants, maintain analytics replica for cross-tenant queries

recommendations.preferred_option: Shard by tenant_id with analytics replica
recommendations.rationale: Best balance of performance, cost, and compliance
recommendations.next_steps: Schedule architecture review with C-level stakeholders

expected_escalation_message.summary: Audit logging coordination successful. 10 tasks executed with immutable logs and 7-year retention, compliance-ready.

optimizations: Immutable log design straightforward with write-once storage

expected_escalation_message.summary: Service mesh coordination successful. 26 tasks executed with Linkerd deployment, 2-3ms latency overhead (meets SLA).

optimizations: Linkerd significantly lighter than Istio, good choice

expected_escalation_message.summary: API versioning coordination successful. 9 tasks executed with URL-based versioning and 12-month deprecation policy.

optimizations: URL versioning simpler than header-based approach

expected_escalation_message.summary: Image optimization coordination successful. 14 tasks executed with 4.2x compression ratio and 65% faster load times.

optimizations: WebP conversion highly effective, 4.2x compression

expected_escalation_message.summary: Background jobs coordination successful. 16 tasks executed with Celery and Redis, 99.5% success rate with retry logic.

optimizations: Celery + Redis combination proven and reliable
